message: I propose dividing the money with a 3:1 ratio, where I receive $750000 and you receive $250000. This offers a fair split considering the risk of inflation.
I'll give you 40% and keep 60%, but I'm willing to negotiate for a better deal.
Considering the inflation, I propose a 50/50 split. Each of us receives $500000. This ensures fairness and equal distribution of the funds.
I'll give you 45% and keep 55%, but I think this is a fairer split than the previous offers.
Given the inflation rate, I propose a 60/40 split, where I receive $600000 and you receive $400000. This maintains a balance while compensating for the loss in value due to inflation.
I'll meet you in the middle, a 50/50 split, but I think I deserve a bit more for taking on the risk of inflation.
